item.title: About me
item.description: I am a passionate Deep Learning Engineer and Technical Leader, specializing in: Machine Learning: Building and deploying state-of-the-art AI models. Computer Vision: Driving advancements in real-time image processing. Software Engineering: Designing scalable and efficient software systems. item.title: Adventures
item.description: I love spending my free time in the great outdoors, combining active rest and adventure. In recent years, I have been drawn to the mountains, building a solid foundation in rock climbing, alpinism, alpine skiing, and ski mountaineering.
